short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a printable business card based on your linkedin profile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start generating business cards today, just enter a linkedIn profile and click generate. You now have a printable 4:2 business cards that you can customize.
